text: Activation of T helper cells results in coordinate expression of a number of cytokines involved in differentiation , proliferation and activation of the haematopoietic system .

text: Cis - acting elements with NF kappa B , AP-1 and ETS-like motifs have been identified in the promoter region of the <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene , which are important for transcriptional activity following PMA and ionomycin stimulation .

text: Here we describe the ability of these factors to interact with a site ( GM5 ) , located within the CLE0 element , -47 to -40 upstream of the <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcription initiation site .
